name: sᴜᴘᴇʀ ʙʟᴜᴇ sǫᴜᴀʀᴇ ʙʀᴏs
description: Use the arrow keys to move and up to jump! Hit item boxes to gain powerups. There are 4 powerups in total. Advance through the levels by reaching the portal. Collect coins and defeat enemies to earn points! Press space to shoot fireballs if you have the powerup. There are 5 levels. Can you defeat the boss? Credits to griffpatch channel for tutorials.
